item.title: Three new addresses holding 74,207 ETH, approximately $273 million
item.description: On July 25th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, within the past 10 hours, 3 new wallets have acquired an additional 74,207 ETH (approximately $2.73 billion). From July 9th onwards, a total of 8 new wallets have acquired a total of 540,460 ETH (approximately $19.9 billion).

item.title: CryptoQuant CEO: Bitcoin Cycle Theory has Become Outdated, Rise of Institutional Long-Term Holders
item.description: On July 25th, Ki Young Ju, the founder and CEO of CryptoQuant, stated in a post on the X platform that the "Bitcoin cycle theory has failed. My previous predictions were based on this theory - buy when whales start accumulating and sell when retail investors start entering. But this pattern is no longer valid.""In the previous cycle, whales sold coins to retail investors. However, this time, old whales sold coins to new long-term holders. The scale of institutional investment far exceeded our expectations. Trading has become meaningless, and now the number of holders has surpassed the number of traders. I overlooked this structural change when making the call for the end of the bull market."

item.title: An Ethereum Whale Sells 3459 ETH, Loses $35,000
item.description: On July 25th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), a certain whale sold 3459 ETH in a short-term period 11 hours ago (approximately $12.58 million), incurring a loss of $35,000. The remaining part is still staked in ether.fi.

item.title: 「Brother Big Brother」 Huang Licheng Holds and Longs PUMP, with a total unrealized loss of over $10 million
item.description: On July 25th, according to the monitoring of LookOnChain, "Brother Ma Ji" Huang Licheng is currently longing for PUMP on Hyperliquid. The position has a realized loss of $8.14 million, and there is a $2.17 million unrealized loss in the spot position. He is still actively adding to the PUMP long position.

item.title: Shitcoin Downtrend Continues, SPK Plunges Over 32% in 24 Hours
item.description: On July 25th, according to HTX market data, the altcoin market continued to decline, and the following situations are as follows:The SPK fell by more than 32% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.112;The SAHARA dropped by more than 30% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.09468;The PENGU dropped by more than 13% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $0.0366;The FXS dropped by more than 13% in 24 hours and is currently trading at $3.192.

item.title: Bloomberg: Crypto Market Faces "Alt Season" Headwinds
item.description: On July 25th, as per Bloomberg, for the majority of experienced crypto traders, the "Altcoin Season" is nearly a regular cycle. Firstly, Bitcoin rises, igniting renewed enthusiasm in the digital asset market. Funds flow into this predominant cryptocurrency, while the interest in "altcoins" gradually wanes. Traders begin to look elsewhere in search of higher returns, giving rise to new stories and narratives. Subsequently, funds rotate into lagging coins, resulting in outsized gains. This phenomenon led speculators to coin the term "Altcoin Season" during the 2017 - 2018 bull market.On July 14th, driven by the enthusiasm of "Crypto Week", Bitcoin reached a new all-time high before entering a narrow trading range. Key figures in the digital asset space and investors hailed Ethereum's breakout and the rebound of the long-suffering NFT sector as a turning point. However, this cycle has been more sporadic in nature rather than a broad-based altcoin boom. XRP surged by over 60% since early

item.title: Former Gemini and Kraken Executive Ji Hun Kim Appointed as CEO of Crypto Innovation Council
item.description: On July 25th, as reported by Cointelegraph, Ji Hun Kim, a former executive at crypto exchanges Gemini and Kraken, has been officially appointed as the Chief Executive Officer of the Crypto Council for Innovation (CCI).Kim previously worked at Gemini for three years and then at Kraken for less than a year. Before that, he served as the Chief Legal and Policy Officer of CCI. Since December 2024, Kim has been serving as the organization's interim CEO.CCI is one of the leading industry advocacy organizations that regularly provides digital asset policy advice to U.S. lawmakers and regulators. In a release, Kim stated that the current time is a crucial moment for industry growth and emphasized the need to build a bridge between technology and public policy.

item.title: 510 billion BONK tokens were transferred from Galaxy Digital to Binance and Coinbase last night, totaling around $18.75 million
item.description: On July 25th, as per Ashes Monitor, last night following the Bonk team's announcement of a buyback and burn of 500 billion BONK (approximately $18.47 million), 510 billion BONK (approximately $18.75 million) were transferred from Galaxy Digital to Binance and Coinbase half an hour later.

item.title: A whale deposited 8.47 million USDC into Hyperliquid and went long on ETH with 3x leverage.
item.description: On July 25th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale transferred 8.47 million USDC to Hyperliquid and initiated a 3x leveraged long position in ETH.

item.title: Christie's Subsidiary Establishes Cryptocurrency Real Estate Department
item.description: On July 25th, as reported by The New York Times, one of the largest luxury real estate brokerage firms in the United States is setting up a dedicated department to enable buyers to use digital currency to purchase real estate.This company is Christie's International Real Estate, becoming the first mainstream real estate brokerage firm to establish a dedicated team to handle transactions solely through cryptocurrency payments. The team consists of lawyers, analysts, and cryptocurrency experts, and is specifically responsible for transactions where both buyers and sellers use digital currency exclusively without relying on banks. As cryptocurrency continues to rapidly enter the mainstream financial sector, Christie's move represents a significant shift.The CEO of Christie's Los Angeles subsidiary, Aaron Kirman, stated that he is currently in negotiations with several major banks to facilitate the acceptance of cryptocurrency as a payment method for property transactions that req
